infos.value: Worry not. We have the upper hand.
Look no further, for I am right here.
Feast your eyes upon me, Oldoa of King Muraga's imperial guard!
There is no need for His Fierceness to concern himself with you pathetic worms.
Come at me, the lot of you!
Ah...s-sorry. My bewilderment got the better of me.
Do not be deceived by her odd mannerisms.
If what she says is true, she's one of Muraga's imperial guards.
